otp_description: To complete opening your account, enter the verification code sent to your email
flutter_training_title: Flutter Training for Building Real Mobile Applications
flutter_training_description:
This Flutter training is not a traditional educational course.
It is a practical program designed to prepare trainees to work on real projects inside the company.
During the training period, the trainee will be part of the work team,
and will deal with real code, real requirements, and daily problems in existing projects,
not just experimental apps or learning examples.
training_depends_on: The training is based on the trainee:
training_point_1: Understand how work is done inside the company
training_point_3: Work with Git and version control
training_point_4: Collaborate within a team and receive continuous feedback
training_goal: The main goal of the training is to transform the trainee from a learner into a Flutter developer who can confidently join and work on any project.
work_nature_title: Nature of Work During the Training
work_real_apps: Participate in developing real mobile applications
work_features: Implement required features in existing projects
work_apis: Work with real APIs and backends
work_clean_architecture: Adhere to clean code and clear architecture principles
